summary: Provides the command‑line infrastructure for the ansible‑test tool, constructing the top‑level argument parser, registering sub‑command modules (such as coverage, environment, integration, sanity, shell, and units), and wiring up auto‑completion and display utilities to coordinate test execution.
business_intent: Allows users to invoke various Ansible testing operations (sanity checks, unit tests, integration runs, environment setup, etc.) through a unified CLI, simplifying test configuration, environment handling, and result presentation.
